content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-9, 24)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5)
- Boiler (position -23.5, 28.5)
- Boiler (position -19.5, 28.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inspecting inventory of offshore pump
- Ensure that the offshore pump is correctly placed and operational before attempting to inspect its inventory.

### Errors when placing pipes overlapping with water
- Avoid placing pipes in locations where their footprint overlaps with water. Check the surrounding area before placing pipes to ensure there are no conflicts.

### Errors when connecting boilers
- Ensure that all connection points are properly aligned and that the boilers are connected to a valid fluid source to avoid the status of NOT_CONNECTED.
